title: Gutti Vankaya Masala Gravy Curry / Brinjal/Egg plant Gravy Curry
content:
Ingredients: Brinjal / Egg plant - 5 to 6 - ( X cut ) Dry Roast: Cumin/ Jeera - 1/2 teaspoon Coriander seeds - 1 teaspoon Sesame seeds - 1/2 tb sp Dry coconut powder - 1 tb sp Dry Red chillies - 3 to 4 Dry Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Hing/ Asaftodia / Inguva - 1/4 teaspoon Ground nuts - 2 tb sp Roasted chickpea - 1 tb sp Gravy: Half chopped onion - 1 cup Tomato ğŸ…Â choppedÂ Â - 1 cup Tamarind extract - 1 cup Salt - 1/2 tb sp Red chilly powder - 1/2 tb sp Jaggery powder - 1 teaspoon Coriander - chopped - 1/2 cup For Tempering: Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/4 tea spoon Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Oil - 3 tb sp Procedure:
  • Dry roast all ingredients mentioned
  • Let them become cool
  • Add dry roasted spices ,roasted ground nuts, chickpea and make smooth powder in mixer grinder
  • Take out Masala Powder aside
  • Add onion and tomatoes in mixer grinder and make smooth puree
  • Heat oil in frying pan add oil
  • Put X- cut Brinjal/ Egg plant in it and cook for 10 to 15 minutes by adding little water and salt
  • Keep them aside
  • In another frying pan add oil
  • Add tempering
  • Let them splutter
  • Add onion+Tomato purÃ©e in it
  • Cook for one minute
  • Add tamarind extract and one cup of water
  • Let it boil and add salt, Red chilli powder and jaggery powder
  • Cook and saute 2 mins
  • Now add Masala powder which prepared and also add 2 cups of water
  • Mix them well and cook 3 to 5 minutes
  • When the Gravy cooked well Add fried Brinjal/ Egg plant
  • Saute and pour gravy on Brinjal/ Egg plant
  • Sprinkle chopped coriander in gravy
  • Cook 2 mins and it's ready to serve
  • Serve it with hot Rice/ Roti ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜‹
